Comments: If included, configuration for the specified **ports** will be deleted.  If *not* included, no ports will be deleted.

| Name of the **port** configuration to delete.
| ``rs232``
| ``rs485``
| ``rs232aux``
If included, configuration for the specified **devices** will be deleted.  If *not* included, no devices will be deleted.
Unique identifier of the **device** to delete.
If included, configuration for the specified **parameters** will be deleted.  If *not* included, no parameters will be deleted.
Unique identifier of the **parameter** to delete.
If included, configuration for the specified **properties** will be deleted.  If *not* included, no properties will be deleted.
The property identification number (within Modbus service) to hold the parameter value.
